posts.post_content:
All cards I sell to my colleagues on this board are sold postpaid and insured.  Paypal OK if you want to eat the fees, otherwise check or MO suit me (take that, Ebay!).  If you don’t like card you get from me, just let me know within a week after delivery and I will refund your purchase price on its return to me.  As always, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

T212 Obak Roth SGC 50 vg-ex: The scan of the card is representative of condition.  $75.00

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=23&pictureid=966[/IMG]

T207 Roger Bresnaham [sic] SGC 40 vg:  $100.00

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=23&pictureid=974[/IMG]
